extendedInfo.description: Switzerland Hotels 80% Discount is one of the largest hotel comparison site with more than 1000++ hotels booking in Switzerland.You get the best interactive Switzerland hotel booking experience with the Switzerland Hotels Booking Booking free Android app â¢ Cheap hotel rooms or 5 star luxury suites,making it easy to find the best accommodation including hotels, apartments and B&Bs.â¢ Use our hotel guest reviews and opinions from genuine customers to find the perfect hotel for you â we even include TripAdvisor reviews!â¢ Search for a place to stay close to your location as well as on our interactive maps.â¢ Sort, filter and compare by price, deals, ratings or reviews with the powerful hotelcombined.com search tools.â¢ Choose your favorite brands including; Hilton, Marriott, Best Western, Sheraton, Holiday Inn and many more.â¢ Simple search by location, dates and guestsâ¢ âAround Meâ search to find what is available around you at that exact momentâ¢ Search results can be viewed two ways - on a map or in a list formatâ¢ Interactive map with zoom in, zoom out, and swipe to reveal more hotels â¢ View all hotel details, guest ratings, images and features the hotel offersâ¢ Comparison table for all hotels and the best rates available for all our partner booking sitesâ¢ Refine your search by price, star ratings, areas, hotel features and moreâ¢ Book with our partner websites by simply clicking âbookâ on your hotel of choiceâ¢ Big image gallery â¢ Apps in 39 languagesâ¢ The only app that allow you to search all the hotel deals in Switzerland and All other Countries.â¢ One search and our app will search all the listed hotels and give you the best prices in one screen for all the deals.  You will see a list of price comparison of the website listed here:www.Agoda.com, www.Expedia.com, www.booking.comand over 10 other websites.
